text:
Some time ago the jsr-225 (xqj ; xquery API for java) released its final spec.

The structure is just like the JAXP specification: it defines a set of interfaces, vendors can implement the specification. At this moment there are already a few vendors who did implement the spec.

the package name is javax.xml.xquery 

My suggestion:
please could you add these interfaces to xml-apis.jar ?


http://jcp.org/aboutJava/communityprocess/final/jsr225/index.html
http://www.infoq.com/news/2007/07/xquery-review
http://saxonica.blogharbor.com/blog/_archives/2007/6/13/3019935.html
creator: dizzzz@exist-db.org
